text: Cavigliano was a municipality of the district Locarno in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 14 April 2013, the former municipalities of Cavigliano, Tegna and Verscio merged to form the new municipality of Terre di Pedemonte.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 18 April 2013 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Cavigliano
